2923.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|126|42$لَا|(do) not|75|90|30$يَدْعُونَ|invoke|87|102|1942$مَعَ|with|48|63|443$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|68|606$إِلَـٰهًا|god|61|76|1222$ءَاخَرَ|another,|76|91|9861$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|111|25$يَقْتُلُونَ|[they] kill|83|92|5144$ٱلنَّفْسَ|the soul|76|95|4994$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|80|232$حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has forbidden|145|164|5152$إِلَّا|except|65|84|86$بِٱلْحَقِّ|by right|78|97|692$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|113|25$يَزْنُونَ‌ۚ|commit adultery.|131|145|12844$وَمَن|And whoever|106|135|1012$يَفْعَلْ|does|65|94|2038$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|93|28$يَلْقَ|will meet|78|107|12845$أَثَامًا|a penalty.|87|101|12846$

2924.verse: يُضَـٰعَفْ|Will be doubled|119|141|12847$لَهُ|for him|65|109|1807$ٱلْعَذَابُ|the punishment|122|166|827$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|149|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) Resurrection,|137|159|820$وَيَخْلُدْ|and he will abide forever|182|267|12848$فِيهِۦ|therein|66|236|32$مُهَانًا|humiliated|86|171|12849$

2925.verse: إِلَّا|Except|65|84|86$مَن|(he) who|80|117|76$تَابَ|repents|70|107|4956$وَءَامَنَ|and believes|102|139|11243$وَعَمِلَ|and does|80|117|621$عَمَلاً صَـٰلِحًا|righteous deeds,|143|162|12850$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then (for) those|127|136|777$يُبَدِّلُ ٱللَّهُ|Allah will replace|129|146|12851$سَيِّـَٔـاتِهِمْ|their evil deeds|121|138|3639$حَسَنَـٰتٍ‌ۗ|(with) good ones.|138|155|12852$وَكَانَ|And is|71|88|363$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|62|123$غَفُورًا|Oft-Forgiving,|112|337|3883$رَّحِيمًا|Most Merciful.|113|338|3814$

2927.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|130|42$لَا|(do) not|75|97|30$يَشْهَدُونَ|bear witness|104|126|4659$ٱلزُّورَ|(to) the falsehood,|146|168|12854$وَإِذَا|and when|84|106|96$مَرُّواْ|they pass|85|96|12855$بِٱللَّغْوِ|by futility,|88|178|1971$مَرُّواْ|they pass|85|265|12855$كِرَامًا|(as) dignified ones|142|232|12856$

2928.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who,|124|133|42$إِذَا|when|55|73|1370$ذُكِّرُواْ|they are reminded|140|158|4809$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|of (the) Verses|121|139|609$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord,|118|136|54$لَمْ|(do) not|75|84|63$يَخِرُّواْ|fall|82|139|12857$عَلَيْهَا|upon them|90|204|1269$صُمًّا|deaf|67|181|12858$وَعُمْيَانًا|and blind.|94|151|12859$

2929.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|133|42$يَقُولُونَ|say,|88|117|753$رَبَّنَا|"Our Lord!|86|115|1167$هَبْ|Grant|57|86|2818$لَنَا|to us|54|83|338$مِنْ|from|50|79|53$أَزْوَٲجِنَا|our spouses|99|113|6094$وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِنَا|and our offspring|132|154|12860$قُرَّةَ|comfort|71|115|12861$أَعْيُنٍ|(to) our eyes,|113|157|12862$وَٱجْعَلْنَا|and make us|103|147|1171$لِلْمُتَّقِينَ|for the righteous|131|153|34$إِمَامًا|a leader."|83|83|1132$

2930.verse: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|107|51$يُجْزَوْنَ|will be awarded|122|173|6838$ٱلْغُرْفَةَ|the Chamber|104|155|12863$بِمَا|because|75|126|43$صَبَرُواْ|they were patient|139|164|6772$وَيُلَقَّوْنَ|and they will be met|155|194|12864$فِيهَا|therein|66|144|253$تَحِيَّةً|(with) greetings|126|204|12679$وَسَلَـٰمًا|and peace.|94|133|11851$

2931.verse: خَـٰلِدِينَ|Will abide forever|134|147|1409$فِيهَا‌ۚ|in it.|57|82|253$حَسُنَتْ|Good|85|110|12865$مُسْتَقَرًّا|(is) the settlement|145|170|12742$وَمُقَامًا|and a resting place.|152|165|12840$

2932.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|57|765$مَا|"Not|48|61|262$يَعْبَؤُاْ|will care|74|87|12866$بِكُمْ|for you|67|80|2564$رَبِّى|my Lord,|77|90|2902$لَوْلَا|if not|55|68|1090$دُعَآؤُكُمْ‌ۖ|your prayer (is to Him).|175|188|12867$فَقَدْ|But verily,|87|94|1016$كَذَّبْتُمْ|you have denied,|134|162|844$فَسَوْفَ|so soon|85|141|3931$يَكُونُ|will be|75|131|2833$لِزَامَۢا|the inevitable (punishment)."|212|240|12868$

2923.verse: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed], except by right, and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse. And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.

2924.verse: Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection, and he will abide therein humiliated -

2925.verse: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work. For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.

2926.verse: And he who repents and does righteousness does indeed turn to Allah with [accepted] repentance.

2927.verse: And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.

2928.verse: And those who, when reminded of the verses of their Lord, do not fall upon them deaf and blind.

2929.verse: And those who say, "Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous."

2930.verse: Those will be awarded the Chamber for what they patiently endured, and they will be received therein with greetings and [words of] peace.

2931.verse: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.

2932.verse: Say, "What would my Lord care for you if not for your supplication?" For you [disbelievers] have denied, so your denial is going to be adherent.
